scripts.test: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const p=require('path').resolve(process.cwd(),'../../packages/executable-stories-vitest/package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.log('Skipping test: executable-stories-vitest not in workspace');process.exit(0);}execSync('vitest run',{stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.report:cli: pnpm exec executable-stories format reports/raw-run.json --format html,markdown --output-dir reports --output-name executable-stories-cli
scripts.type-check: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const p=require('path').resolve(process.cwd(),'../../packages/executable-stories-vitest/package.json');if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.log('Skipping type-check: executable-stories-vitest not in workspace');process.exit(0);}execSync('pnpm --filter executable-stories-vitest run build && tsc --noEmit',{stdio:'inherit'});"
